Title: Prohibits certain child care facilities from employing felons; provides criminal record access for certain child care entities
Summary: Prohibits certain enumerated child care facilities from employing or using as volunteers, persons convicted of certain enumerated offenses; allows the facilities to have access to criminal records of its volunteers and employees and prospective volunteers and employees.
LawCode: Add ยง378-b, Soc Serv L; amd ยง837, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the executive law, in relation to day care for children
